inputFields.name: afterDateTime
inputFields.description: Show only events starting after the specified date.

inputFields.name: beforeDateTime
inputFields.description: Show only events starting before the specified date.

inputFields.name: hostId
inputFields.description: Show only events hosted by the specified member.

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: Show only events in the specified statuses.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Show only events with title matching the specified string (case-insensitive).
